thread.title: Interblock Signs Deals That Will Bring Interblock Footprint in State to Over 1,000 Stations of Recurring Revenue
thread.title_full: Interblock Signs Deals That Will Bring Interblock Footprint in State to Over 1,000 Stations of Recurring Revenue

title: Interblock Signs Deals That Will Bring Interblock Footprint in State to Over 1,000 Stations of Recurring Revenue
text:
SOURCE: Interblock September 24, 2015 14:29 ET Interblock Signs Deals That Will Bring Interblock Footprint in State to Over 1,000 Stations of Recurring Revenue 
Interblock's Position in the New York Market Continues to Grow With Addition of State's First Electronic Blackjack 
LAS VEGAS, NV --(Marketwired - September 24, 2015) - Achieving another company milestone, luxury gaming manufacturer Interblock® is bringing electronic blackjack to New York State for the first time, with plans to install more than 228 incremental Organic ETG Blackjack stations on long term, multi-year deals. 
Interblock's popular games, including roulette and baccarat, already dominate the New York gaming landscape, where there are approximately 800 recurring revenue stations currently in place at Resorts World New York and Empire City Casino at Yonkers Raceway. The upcoming installations bring the Interblock footprint to over 1,000 stations. 
"With recent new legislation and regulatory approval of blackjack clearing the way, Interblock is happy to partner with two premiere properties in New York to bring the first-ever electronic blackjack to players, and to usher in a new era in casino entertainment in the State," said Rob Bone, Interblock North America President. 
The Organic Blackjack games coming to New York are the latest iterations in Interblock's popular blackjack game. It features several efficiency enhancements in game speed, as well as multimedia innovations that provides players with a great deal of game information, along with several animation enhancements that create a more interesting and engrossing game play experience. 
Interblock will showcase its Blackjack games, along with a wealth of new product that is current, evolutionary, and revolutionary in booth #1239 at the upcoming Global Gaming Expo. 
"We continue to lead the industry in electronic table game innovations, and there has never been a better time to do business with Interblock. We invite everyone to experience our innovations first-hand at G2E," Bone said. 
Join Interblock on Facebook , LinkedIn , Twitter and YouTube . 
About Interblock Interblock® is a worldwide leading developer and supplier of luxury electronic table gaming products. Its multi-player gaming devices set industry standards and provide the ultimate in luxury interactive entertainment experiences. The Interblock brand is globally recognized for diamond quality gaming solutions and technical support in more than 130 jurisdictions. Interblock's exclusive collection of fully and semi-automated electronic gaming tables and video gaming solutions provide casinos, arcades and gambling halls with superior product performance and their guests with an unforgettable gaming experience. For more information, visit www.interblockgaming.com or call +1 (702) 260-1384. Contact Information
